summary:
I am Electromechanical Engineer with a Master's Degree in Project Management. I am interested in the evaluation and improvement of processes in applications of electrical systems, renewable energies and solutions for the improvement of the environment.
I have experience in the field of electrical engineering, designing industrial electrical systems, while coordinating, contracting and carrying out projects of Hydropower generators as well as the installation of CableCars in urban enviroments. 
Currently I apply my knowledge of mechanical engineering in the technical calculations for profiles of cable cars, but I have also managed to make calculations and designs on electrical engineering and electrical lines in low and high voltage. 
I am reliable person and really take care on the quality and safety at work so I consider myself a team worker. I have worked in different environments and adapt quickly to new situations, I am capable of managing staff and coordinate complex projects to deliver them on time, I have successfully managed staff under my charge with commitment and respect. 
I am certified in ISO 50001 and 50002; I am also familiar with standards ISO 9001, 14001 and OHSAS 18000

school.name: Escuela Colombiana de Ingeniería Julio Garavito
Universidad Pedagógica y Tecnológica de Colombia
Universidad Pedagógica y Tecnológica de Colombia

courses.name: MBA con énfasis en dirección de proyectos

profile_positions.location: Bogotá DC; Mexico City; La Paz
profile_positions.description:
•	Develop the mechanical calculations for the profiles for Cable cars required in the Latinamerican market for Transport Systems.
•	System engineer on site for the installation of the Cable Transport System built in the City of La Paz in Bolivia, where is located the largest Cable Transport system in the World, with a total of 30km long. I have had around 12 people incharge in La Paz, Bolivia with different tasks assigned to accomplish the project on time. I was incharge of the integration of the electromechanical equipment with the rest of the areas for the project like arquitecture, civil engineering, safety and social departments. 
•	System engineer incharge of the support on site controlling the schedule for the construction, erection and testing of the Ciudad Bolivar Cable Transport System, located in Bogotá Colombia.
•	I have relocated to different countries like Mexico, Bolivia and Colombia to be the system engineer incharge of the integration of the electromechanical equipment and the rest of the disciplines involved in the project. 
•	Support the after sales department of the company once I relocate to the site of the project if issues arise once the project is delivered.
•	Support the sales department in the presentation of technical-economic bids, additional to the technical calculation, I have to consider the additional technical risks so the additional jobs are been consider once the project is signed.
profile_positions.title: Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Specialist in excitation systems for generators with dynamic exciter. I have commissioned compact excitation systems for hydroelectric generators up to 40MW. Nowadays, I still perform commissioning for excitation systems as freelancer when a company with this type of excitation needs it. 
•	Perfomed test for protection systems using Siemens relays Siprotec, I participated in the FAT, SAT test and commissioned the protection systems for generators of 13,2kV and transimion lines of 115kV. 
•	Development of auxiliary service system designs for hydroelectric generators, including AC, DC distribution systems and cubicles.
•	Developed substation designs for hydroelectric plants to be coupled to the National Grid, I performed the calculation of feeders, design and project management for a GIS switchgear substation of 115kV built in South Korea. I have perform the FAT and SAT test before installation in a 80MW hydroelectric plant in Colombia. 
•	Made the selection, implementation and testing of instrumentation for generating machines up to 13,2kV according to the technical requirements required in case of modernization or upgrades.
•	Made the technical specifications for the implementation of electric power equipment like switchgears for medium voltage and transformers in accordance with the installation requirements.
•	Made designs of electrical panels considering the electromechanical systems of a hydroelectric plant, I have been responsible for carrying out the designs, as well as the protocols for FAT and SAT tests before the commissioning in hydroelectrical power plants.
profile_positions.title: Electrical engineer for design phase and execution phase

profile_positions.description:
•	Made designs of electrical AIS substations up to 34kV, did the technical analysis for adequate design focused on economy, safety, reliability, quality and sustainability.
•	Conducted designs for electrical lines up to 34kV, of 1,5km aprox using the software PLSCADD.
•	Technical and economic analysis of solutions designed like medium voltage substations, prepared budgets and specifications for the design to be implemented.
•	Prepared technical specifications for bidding, detailed engineering, and made researchs on suitable solutions and estimating costs and timescales.
•	Conducted tests for earth resistance and resistivity, based on them I made designs for ground systems using the methodology IEEE 80 and 81.
•	Made a research to create a local standard for the network operator for low and medium voltage connections, so the consumers follow the technical requisits to connect to the grid in a safe way.
profile_positions.title: Electrical engineer in the Design department

profile_positions.description:
•	Coordinated and planned the technical maintenance of the electrical system in high and low voltage of the facilities that consisted in administrative buildings, terraces with a controlled pumping system, automated lighting system as well as automated air conditioned system.
•	System engineer been responsible for contracting and did the technical supervision of electrical work as well as request for quotations, descriptions and planning of scope of work and purchasing of parts.
•	Developed manuals of instructions to describe maintenance at work as a plan for improving the quality and safety at work.
•	Troubleshooted general electrical equipment; like motors, generators, uninterruptable power supplies, automation systems and controls. 
•	Supported and participated in the scheme for automation and control of air conditioning systems, hydraulics and lighting of the facilities of the World Centre.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed power quality studies and tests for electrical systems in industrial companies and administrative buildings following standard IEEE 519, based on the measurements provided diagnosis and solutions for improving the power quality at the tested location. 
•	Field engineer, taking measurements for power quality and grounding test analysis, detection of faults, elaboration of reports and recommendation for their improvement.
•	Power system studies, supporting protective devices coordination and power quality analysis for commercial, industrial and utilities system.
profile_positions.title: Electrical engineer consultant in the Power quality department

profile_positions.description:
•	Implemented a program for the rational use of electricity in the company, including the estimation of energy savings through the evaluation of the process and efficiency of the equipment.
•	Evaluated the practices for the adoption and accomplishment of several tasks to reduce the electrical consumption in the factory.
•	Implemented and troubleshooted a power monitoring system, and assessed the energy management system identifying potential energy savings without investment.
•	I worked in the electrical maintenance department evaluating the energy efficiency of equipment in the factory.
•	Planning, supervising and supporting the installation and testing of equipment, technical supervision of contractors and planning the scope of work required for different installations.
profile_positions.title: Trainee, Thesis
